Mourning Frost is one of the Two-Handed Melee Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc.) Characters need to master certain Proficiency in order to gain a bonus using this type of weapon, and sometimes gain special Actions while holding it.
